Description:
Detects when a Security Compliance Center reported a user who exceeded sending limits of the service policies and because of this has been restricted from sending email.

Author: austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Microsoft 365 - User Restricted from Sending Email
Query: sourcetype="m365-threat_management" eventsource="SecurityComplianceCenter" eventname="User restricted from sending email" status="success"
